item.description:
The third annual pumpkin halloween ball is Friday, Oct 30 at Crowne Plaza in Nashua. Hopefully this year the beer tasting will happen. Please sign up on the Beer Alliance site by following this link:

http://www.meetup.com...

Event Description According to Beer Alliance:
BeerEncounters.com's 3rd Annual Great Pumpkin Halloween Ball is New Hampshire's biggest and 3rd Annual Great Pumpkin Halloween Ball
New England's Best Fall Craft Beer Event!

Hosted By:
BeerEncounters.com

Sponsored By: Magic Hat Brewing Company & Shipyard Brewing Company

If youâ€™ve never been to a Beer Encounters event, now is your chance.
This is the biggest and best Halloween party our area has to offer!

Witness an Incredible night of entertainment!

Sample a wide variety of Pumpkin Ales, Oktoberfest Style Brews and Fall Seasonal Offerings from our
Sponsoring Brewing Companies!

Visit the Breweries Exhibit Booth for Free Samples and Giveaways!

Dance the Night Away to the Music of;
DJ Matty Z

Delicious Seasonal Food Offerings Will be Passed Throughout the Night

Enter the Laboratory of;
Professor Philthestein
This Wacky Mad Scientist Will Amaze You With His Magic and Antics.

Win the Grand Prize in our Costume Contest!
Prizes Catorgories Are;
Scariest, Sexiest, Best Couple and Best Over All!
(Crowd Chooses the Winners!)

Visit "one on one" inside the Psychic Tent with New Hampshire's own;
Angie D'Anjou
Spiritual Consultant
Tarot Card Readings by Candle Light

Visit the Caricatures Artist
John Watson
Have Your Own Souvenir Picture done.

Try your luck at Pumpkin bowling and win prizes!

Witness an Incredible Halloween Light Show

Rub Elbows with Costumed Characters in a Harrowing Atmosphere.

Get an Assortment of Souvenir Photos.

Everyone is Entered to Win Excellent Door Prizes

...and more surprises and entertainment added every day!

http://www.beerencoun...

$15 when purchased online before October 1st
$20 when purchased online during the Month of October
$30 at the door (if any tickets are available)
(You must be 21 or older to attend this event)
item.name: 3rd. Annual Great Pumpkin Halloween Ball
